creator: Dan McCreary

description: An interactive infographic showing the five memory layers in Claude Code, demonstrating how rules are loaded from Enterprise Policy, Project Memory, Project Rules, User Memory, and Project Local layers with animated loading sequence and hover interactions.

learningObjectives: Understand the five memory layers in Claude Code
Learn the priority order of rule loading
Understand how higher-priority rules override lower-priority ones
Identify appropriate use cases for each memory layer

controls.label: Play Animation
controls.description: Starts or pauses the loading animation

controls.label: Reset
controls.description: Resets the animation to the beginning

interactions.description: Hover over any memory layer to see detailed information
